patthana24.16:4.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nahetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.16:4.2: Naaraṇaṃ nahetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.16:5.1: Hetuyā dve … pe … purejāte āsevane ekaṃ … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate dve.
patthana24.16:6.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nahetuvippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo hetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.16:6.2: Naaraṇaṃ nahetuvippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo hetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.16:7.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … sahajāte cattāri … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate cattāri.
